meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or characteristic of birds.
meanings.sent1: The avine feathers were colorful and beautiful.
meanings.sent2: The avine creatures chirped happily in the trees.
meanings.sent3: The avine friends flew together in perfect harmony.
meanings.sent4: Her avine nature made her stand out in a crowd of mammals.
meanings.sent5: The avine world was filled with songs and fluttering wings.

meanings.sent1: I saw an avine perched on the branch outside my window.
meanings.sent2: The avine soared gracefully through the sky.
meanings.sent3: The avine pecked at the crumbs on the ground with enthusiasm.
meanings.sent4: She was as free as an avine, gliding through life effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The avine's song filled the air with a sweet melody.
